name: Tank Forces - Iron Hero
description:
Battle through dangerous arenas and become the Iron Hero!
Fast paced 3D tank action.
Take out your enemies and use boosts at levels.
Battle against cunning enemies and become the Iron Hero in Tank Forces!

FEATURES:
* Beautiful 3D graphics with realtime shadows and dynamic lighting
* 80 levels spanning 8 unique worlds
* 7 types of boost modifications in levels
* 9 types of enemies to fight against
